dict.string: Make your way down to the entrance of Cassell Coliseum to start the registration process with a VTHacks volunteer. Lunch will be served shortly afterwards.
Start of the opening ceremony, at this time please go to the stands to grab a seat and get ready for the opening demos.
Meet new hackers, get together with friends, talk about ideas, and start forming a team. After you're set, begin haking.
Dinner will be served at this time. Please make your way to the designated food pick-up locations.
Breakfast bagels will be served at the breakfast location at this time.
At this time you can start to show off your hack by your desk. We will select the top ten hackers who will be doing a demo on stage very soon.
The finalist that the VTHacks staff notified will now demo in front everyone.
Announce the winners of the hackathon and take photos.
Wrap up VTHacks and make any last minute announcements.
